author: Jay Busbee
title: The story of the 2022 Beijing Olympics - Yahoo Sports
description: Here’s the story of the 2022 Beijing Olympics, as told by the people who lived it.
content: The 2022 Winter Olympics wrapped up with fireworks lighting up the sky over Beijings Birds Nest Stadium Sunday night, bringing an end to a Games fraught with controversy. From COVID protocols to gold… [+17197 chars]
